LOGIN.PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER: Easy to remember, hard to guess.
LOGIN.ERROR_401: Unrecognized email or password. Please try again.
LOGIN.ERROR_UNKNOWN: Oops! Something went wrong! Please try again later.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot Password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.INSTRUCTIONS: Enter your email address, and we will send you an email with a link that will allow you to reset your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.NO_ACCOUNT: An account with that email address could not be found.
FORGOT_PASSWORD.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please contact support if this happens again.

SIGNUP.PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER: Easy to remember, hard to guess
SIGNUP.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account already exists for that email address.
SIGNUP.ERROR_UNKNOWN: There was a problem signing you up. Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact support.

404.TITLE: Page not found
404.DESCRIPTION: We're sorry, but the page you're looking for can't be found.
